Reflex.SayString: You have come far. Now, I give you new power... Behold!
Hmmm...how can I get through? Perhaps Koduwan can help me.
Use your solar power to break through! Press <a>
You win, here's a soccer ball to play with. Sheesh.
Greetings, <turtle>! Your princess has gone to the Star World Enter, and I will take you there!
